casebody.data:
THE ADRIATIC. THE ST. MICHAEL. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. December 22, 1922.) No. 124. Karlin, Woolsey, Campbell, Hickox & Keating, of New York City (W. H. McOrann, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Burlingham, Veeder, Masten & Fearey, of New York City (Chauncey I. Clark and J. Harvey Turnure, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before BOGEBS, HOUGH, and MAYEB, Circuit Judges.

PEB CUBIAM.

Decree affirmed.
